meta.hint: A statement tells you about something. It ends  with a full stop. Example-. Tarun took a cookie.  A question asks something. It ends with a question mark.  Example-. Are you coming with me to the party?  An exclamation is like a statement but shows surprise or a  strong feeling. It ends with an exclamation mark. Example-.How beautiful this city is!  A command tells someone to do something. Most of the  time, a command ends with a full stop. If it shows a strong  feeling, it ends with an exclamation mark.  Example-.Open the door!                 Come with me.
meta.question: Identify whether the  given sentence is a statement, question,  command, or question.
